.class public auto ansi sealed SyncObjectEvents_ProgressEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SyncObjectEvents_ProgressEventHandler(State As OlSyncState, Description As String, Value As Integer, Max As Integer)
public delegate void SyncObjectEvents_ProgressEventHandler(OlSyncState State, System::String ^ Description, int Value, int Max);

param.name: State
param.span: Um valor que identifica o estado atual do processo de sincronização.

span.span: A value that identifies the current state of the synchronization process.

param.name: Description
param.span: Uma descrição textual do estado atual do processo de sincronização.

span.span: A textual description of the current state of the synchronization process.

param.name: Value
param.span: Especifica o valor atual do processo de sincronização (como o número de itens sincronizados).

span.span: Specifies the current value of the synchronization process (such as the number of items synchronized).

param.name: Max
param.span: O valor máximo que pode alcançar.
A proporção entre para representa a porcentagem concluída do processo de sincronização.

span.span: The ratio of to represents the percent complete of the synchronization process.

summary.span: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.

span.span: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event.
